name: Cubix (Tazl)
description:
A simple rage game where you play as a cube trying to get through levels while everything is trying to kill you.

Download is free!

Anything red will kill you.

When I say anything, I mean ANYTHING. Watch out for anything red from cubes, rectangles, hell I think I saw a red circle.

Get past the level before the level kills you!

yeah some of them chase you down which is kind of worrying
